Texts.Chs: 在显微镜下放置一只^cyan;野生蜂后^reset;来扫描她的属性，这会极大地影响你的繁殖选择。
Texts.Eng: Placing a ^cyan;Wild Queen^reset; in a microscope will allow you to scan her stats, which can greatly influence your breeding choices.

Texts.Chs: 当你抓到野生蜂后时，你可能说不情关于它们的知识，你也不能光靠猜测来利用它们。所以，试着在蜜蜂站制造一台^orange;基础显微镜^reset;。
Texts.Eng: When you catch wild queens, you can't tell much about them. You can't use them well tthrough guesswork. So, try building a ^orange;Basic Microscope^reset; in the bee station.
